messages.title: Backing the Liberal Democrats
messages.content: Join me in backing the Liberal Democrats this time around and help build a brighter future for our children.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An extra £10 billion for schools, recruitment of 20,000 new teachers, reduce class sizes, improve education for each and every child.
35 hours of free childcare from nine months will make work more affordable for working families, improving families’ wellbeing and bank balances.

mentions.candidate: As a mother of three young children, and someone who teaches a classroom of 5-year-olds day in, day out.

issues.brexitEurope: The damage Brexit will do to our country doesn’t bear thinking about. Sort of Brexit is bad news for our schools and public services.
issues.education: An extra £10 billion for schools, recruitment of 20,000 new teachers, reduce class sizes, education is improved for each and every child.
issues.socialWelfare: 35 hours free childcare from nine months will make work more affordable for working families, improving families’ wellbeing and bank balances.

personalStatement: As a mother of three young children, and someone who teaches a classroom of 5-year-olds day in, day out, I can’t bear the thought of what Brexit will mean for them.

examples: As a mother of three young children, and someone who teaches a classroom of 5-year-olds day in, day out, I can’t bear the thought of what Brexit will mean for them.
The damage Brexit will do to our country doesn’t bear thinking about.
Let’s be clear: any sort of Brexit is bad news for our schools and public services.
As a working mum, I know the real difference 35 hours of free childcare from nine months will make to working families.
Opportunities for our children and children’s children will be drastically reduced.
The damage Brexit will do to our country doesn’t bear thinking about.

personalStories.story: As a mother of three young children, and someone who teaches a classroom of 5-year-olds day in, day out, I can’t bear the thought of what Brexit will mean for them.

examples: The damage Brexit will do to our country doesn’t bear thinking about.
